description:
Track your nutrition easily and fast.
  • Track your meals including calories, macro- and micronutrients
  • Use several databases (Open Food Facts, USDA, and Swiss Food Composition Database) or create custom food
  • Search meals by product name or just scan the barcode
  • Get meal suggestions based on your last tracked meals
  • Set targets for macro- and micronutrients including calculating them based on your personal details
  • See your daily nutrition details
  • Create and restore encrypted backups (Local or WebDAV)
